content: stripe section 48 sts using b knit 3 rnds round 1 k2b k1d k4b work 9 sts as given for round 1 of chart b k3b 3 times k1b k1d k2b k1d 48 sts snowflake motif band round 2 k1b k1d k5b work 9 sts as given for round join in cayenne pepper d using chart b or the 2 of chart b k3b 3 times k2b k1d k1b k1d written instructions and starting at round 1 work 7 round 3 k1d k6b work 9 sts as given for round 3 of rnds of chart b using b and d following chart b for chart b k3b 3 times k3b k2d your size remember to carry a with you as you knit round 4 k3d k4b work 9 sts as given for round 4 of twisting the yarns together at least once so that you chart b k3b 3 times k1b k3d k1b don t end up with a long float that is not anchored round 5 repeat round 3 working round 5 from chart b round 6 repeat round 2 working round 6 from chart b chart b 9 sts round 7 repeat round 1 working round 7 from chart b round 1 k1b k1d k2b k1d twice k1b round 2 k2b k1d k1b k1d twice k2b 52 sts round 3 k3b k3d k3b round 1 *k1d k2b k1d twice k1b work 9 sts as round 4 k1b k3d twice k1b given for round 1 of chart b twice repeat from * once more round 5 repeat round 3 56 sts round 6 repeat round 2 round 2 * k1b k1d 3 times k2b work 9 sts as given round 7 repeat round 1 for round 2 of chart b twice repeat from * once more round 3 *k2b k3d k3b work 9 sts as given for round 9 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 3 of chart b twice repeat from * once more 7 round 4 * k3d k1b twice work 9 sts as given for round 4 of chart b twice repeat from * once more 6 round 5 repeat round 3 working round 5 from chart b 5 round 6 repeat round 2 working round 6 from chart b 4 round 7 repeat round 1 working round 7 from chart b 3 2 56 sts round 1 * work 9 sts as given for round 1 of chart b 1 3 times k1b repeat from * once more 56 sts rnds 2 7 as for round 1 following each round of chart b colour b colour d 6 7 60 sts for left and right socks round 1 work 9 sts as given for round 1 of chart b k1b join in either c or d as a contrast heel you can 6 times 60 sts choose to work both heels in the same colour or rnds 2 7 as for round 1 following each round of chart b alternate colours using c
